sentences.sContent: She adjourned the meeting until tomorrow at 9 a.m.
sentences.sContent_eng: She adjourned the meeting until tomorrow at 9 a.m.
sentences.sCn: 她把会议延至明天上午9点举行。

sentences.sContent: The time appointed for the mass meeting was 9 a.m.
sentences.sContent_eng: The time appointed for the mass meeting was 9 a.m.
sentences.sCn: 群众大会上午9点届时召开。

sentences.sContent: Radio Beijing radiobroadcasts news at 9 a.m. every day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Radio Beijing radiobroadcasts news at 9 a.m. every day.
sentences.sCn: 北京广播电台每天上午九时广播新闻。
